name: blockly-js-editor
description: Write Javascript with Scratch-clone Blockly! or visa-versa!

scripts.publish: current_branch="`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD`"; git branch -D gh-pages; git checkout -b gh-pages; browserify example/example.js -o bundle.js; git add -A; git commit -m 'New Build'; git push -f origin gh-pages; git checkout $current_branch

author: kumavis
